title: Update monitored wallets to track greedyjew issuer and project dev wallet

requirements.summary: Replace monitored wallet addresses in TokenList with greedyjew issuer wallet and project dev wallet
acceptanceCriteria: TokenList component displays data for wallet rdRvw4pKmEtSnz3cjXBL6HLJJmejtkoQ4 labeled as 'GreedyJEW Issuer'
TokenList component displays data for wallet rw3DPxgusRrvdsbXSjHdXD14ogkNidTTRx labeled as 'Project Dev Wallet'
Both wallets show trust lines, balances, and holdings correctly
Previous wallet addresses (greedyjew and Hebroid placeholders) are completely removed

file_operations.description: Update the walletAddresses array to replace existing placeholder addresses with rdRvw4pKmEtSnz3cjXBL6HLJJmejtkoQ4 (labeled 'GreedyJEW Issuer') and rw3DPxgusRrvdsbXSjHdXD14ogkNidTTRx (labeled 'Project Dev Wallet'). Ensure the component's state management, error tracking per wallet, and retry logic continue to work with these new addresses. Remove all previous wallet address entries.

requirements.summary: Update TokenMetrics to fetch token holdings from greedyjew issuer and project dev wallets
acceptanceCriteria: TokenMetrics component queries both wallets for token holdings
Token detail view shows holdings from issuer wallet and dev wallet separately
Per-wallet error handling and retry logic works for both addresses

file_operations.description: Update the walletAddresses array to use rdRvw4pKmEtSnz3cjXBL6HLJJmejtkoQ4 (labeled 'GreedyJEW Issuer') and rw3DPxgusRrvdsbXSjHdXD14ogkNidTTRx (labeled 'Project Dev Wallet') when fetching token holdings for the detail view. requirements.summary: Update WalletHoldings to support viewing detailed holdings for both issuer and dev wallets with proper identification
acceptanceCriteria: WalletHoldings component accepts either wallet address as input
UI clearly identifies which wallet is being displayed (Issuer vs Dev Wallet)
XRP balance, trust lines, and NFTs load correctly for both addresses
Address validation and error handling work for both wallets

file_operations.description: Add wallet identification logic that displays 'GreedyJEW Issuer' when the address is rdRvw4pKmEtSnz3cjXBL6HLJJmejtkoQ4 and 'Project Dev Wallet' when the address is rw3DPxgusRrvdsbXSjHdXD14ogkNidTTRx. Update the component header or title to show this label alongside or instead of the raw address. Ensure address validation, error handling, and data fetching for XRP balance, trust lines, and NFTs continue to work correctly for both wallet addresses.
